title: DBL-PBL Integrated Curriculum for Strengthening Software Engineering Practical Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of fundamental software development concepts and proficiency in one or more programming languages
context.additional_context: Customized education for medical/legal/technical professionals to experience software system design and verification processes, cultivating problem-solving abilities in real industrial settings

learning_goals: Learners can design a software system based on real-world industry scenarios within 4 weeks.
Learners experience all stages of the software development lifecycle by collaborating with team members in a VR simulation environment.
Learners perform requirement analysis, design, and test verification processes with an achievement rate of over 80% in the final summative assessment.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
